name: Benchmark Merchant Solutions
overview:
Benchmark Merchant Solutions is a nationwide credit card processor that has grown exponentially while setting a new standard of quality within the processing industry.

As a registered ISO and MSP of Deutsche Bank AG, Benchmark Merchant Solutions maintains the highest standards in security, quality, and transparency.

Benchmark Merchant Solutions values each of their Merchants regardless of the company’s size or revenue stream while helping each Merchant remain in compliance with industry standards as it applies to fraud prevention and security.

As an industry Titan, Benchmark Merchant Solutions maintains a strong rapport with each of their Merchants while utilizing efficient and reliable in-house customer service teams; Benchmark Merchant Solutions creates an ongoing business relationship with each Merchant to better enhance their experience while offering them 24/7 technical support.

www.BenchmarkMerchantSolutions.com www.swipeBMS.com
